text: Bjørn Andressen (also spelled Andreassen, 8 September 1946 - 27 January 2015) was a Norwegian ice hockey player. He was born in Oslo and represented the club Jar IL. He played for the Norwegian national ice hockey team, and participated at the Winter Olympics in Sapporo in 1972, where the Norwegian team placed 8th. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Norwegian ice hockey players Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Norway Category:Ice hockey players at the 1972 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Oslo
title: Bjørn Andressen
